attributes.action: Carry out a full national inquiry into 'Grooming Gangs'
attributes.additional_details: It is long overdue, and necessary to ensure those responsible face justice, and that they do not remain in positions of power.
attributes.background: Carry out a full enquiry into 'Grooming Gangs' across the UK, and identify any officials complicit in covering up the full extent of the problem.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
